project.name: AI–IoT Builder Workstation
project.description: A responsive single-page web application presenting the AI–IoT Builder Workstation developed around the NVIDIA Jetson Nano. Designed to demonstrate real-world AI integration with sensors, machine learning, and real-time data pipelines for educational purposes.
features: Integrated AI curriculum and structured assignments
Sensor-based smart applications and cloud connectivity
Modern responsive design and clean UI
No external libraries — pure HTML, CSS, and JS
